queries.query: aquatic fey creature that can poison water and becomes invisible when submerged
queries.variant: fey creature that lives in water and poisons water while being invisible underwater

queries.query: medium-sized water creature with stealth abilities and charm in social interactions
queries.variant: medium fey with charm and stealthy aquatic abilities

queries.query: creature that manipulates water and becomes weaker when away from water
queries.variant: water-manipulating creature that gets weak when not near water

queries.query: fey that uses spells and weapons for combat while being good at stealth
queries.variant: stealthy fey that casts spells and attacks with a dagger

queries.query: Fey creature with cold damage attacks and can purify water
queries.variant: cold damage attacking fey that can also purify water
